title: The Snyder Cut Commentary: A ‘Zack Snyder’s Justice League’ Watch-along
description:
This is a very, very special episode of 'The Big Picture': our first watch-along commentary track. For 'Zack Snyder’s Justice League.' Except we’ve never seen it before. So when we press play on the Snyder Cut for the first time, we want you to do so as well and to watch with us on HBO Max. We will be together for all four hours and two minutes of this film’s run time discussing Batman, Superman, Wonder Woman, Steppenwolf, Darkseid, and especially Ben Affleck’s hair. For four hours. Let’s go. 

Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
Guests: Chris Ryan
